content: The equipped effect replenishes Health when you take any sort of Medicine, which can be handy in the Webbed Hollow and other places where you are likely to get status afflictions.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snake_Herbalist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Snake Herbalist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Herbalist Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The equipped effect replenishes Health when you take any sort of Medicine, which can be handy in the Webbed Hollow and other places where you are likely to get status afflictions.
